body.p:
Strategy Markup Language (StratML) is an XML vocabulary and schema for strategic plans. supports StratML Part 1 (Strategic Plan) and StratML Part 2 (Performance Plans and Reports) and provides templates for the following documents:
Strategic Plan (StratML Part 1)
Performance Plan (StratML Part 2)
Performance Report - (StratML Part 2)
Strategic Plan - (StratML Part 2)
You can view the components of a StratML document in the Outline view. implements a default XML with XSLT transformation scenario for this document type, called StratML to HTML.
